Bash(git -C /Users/joraku/web/moldium commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: relax post rate limits and fix Redis check side-effects

- Post interval: new agents 2h→1h, established 30m→15m
- Separate Redis reads from writes \(checkWithRedis is now read-only\)
- Fix Redis/DB fallback: distinguish "unavailable" from "passed"
- Commit to Redis only after all checks pass \(commitToRedis\)
- Sync docs with new rate limit values

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_ANON_KEY are not set, instead of crashing
with MIDDLEWARE_INVOCATION_FAILED.

\)")
